description:

Welcome to 2059 Emily St! Get ready to fall in love with this beautiful 3 bedroom / 1.5 bathroom home, offering modern accents and clean finishes throughout! Hardwood floors, newer appliances, bright natural light, great storage space, and convenient features await at this gem located in the popular West Passyunk  neighborhood of Philadelphia. Gold hardware adds touches of mid-century modern style, while minimalistic elements like white shaker cabinets and subway tile all contribute to the bright and airy feel of the home. The bathroom boasts a full tub with sliding glass doors, geometric tile accents, and sleek fixtures. The basement has lots of clean storage space and a washer and dryer. title: Spectacular Artist Loft with Central A/C & FREE Laundry - Must See
description:
Available early April:
Welcome to 109 W Wildey St #111 at the Schoolhouse Lofts! The Schoolhouse Lofts are a community of modern-industrial artist lofts inside the historic Daniel Boone School located at the cross-section of Fishtown and Northern Liberties area of Philadelphia. This beautiful, late gothic revival building was classically known as the Philadelphia school for the rebellious. This building brings a unique mix of old and new with trendy design elements like minimalistic lighting fixtures, exposed beams, original brick work, and fantastically intricate original details. This leading boutique building offers modern conveniences for modern living. The public spaces such as the elevator, mailroom, and multiple laundry rooms are custom engineered to minimize stress and maximize well-being. Unit #111 is a fantastic studio apartment, offering high ceilings, huge windows, 3 closets for great storage space, and a bright and airy atmosphere. You enter the unit into a hallway with hardwood floors and exposed beams that continue throughout the entire space. There is a kitchen to the left with tile backsplash, granite countertops, great cabinetry for storage, and a full set of stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, microwave, oven/stove, and refrigerator. This large unit offers space for a living/dining area in front of the kitchen by the 4 giant windows – perfect for your plants! A black divider offers privacy for a bed towards the back left of the apartment. Your bathroom offers a medicine cabinet, vanity, and shower/tub combo. All units have Central A/C! FREE laundry in laundry rooms located on the 1st, 2nd, and Penthouse floors of the building. Schedule a showing today!

title: 3 BR West Mt. Airy Home
description:
Gracious West Mount Airy home located on a quiet, one way, tree-lined street.
This 3-story, 3-bedroom, 1 bath home has hardwood floors throughout. First floor includes living room, dining room, kitchen, and laundry room. The second floor has 2 bedrooms and the bathroom; on the third is a large bedroom and additional room perfect for an office, library or other work area. A basement provides ample storage space. There is a shaded brick patio with border plantings.and plenty of space for seating.
Gas heat (brand new heater); and central air conditioning.
This is a great location conveniently near the shops and restaurants in Mt. Airy and 2 blocks from the Allen’s Lane stop on the Chestnut Hill West train line. It is 20 minutes from downtown Philadelphia and close to the beautiful Wissahickon Valley with its hiking and bike trails.
All garden maintenance and snow removal is provided at no charge..
$2100 per month + utilities.
An application and credit assessment is required for each prospective tenant with a processing fee of $30 per person.
The home is available June 1.
Please feel free to email with any questions.

title: Modern 4BD Home with 1.5 Car GARAGE PARKING - Must See
description:
Available early June:
Welcome to 1038 E Columbia Avenue! This 4 bedroom / 2 bathroom corner home features 1.5 car GARAGE PARKING, fenced front yard, hardwood floors, recessed lighting, exposed brick walls, and modern fixtures throughout. Your front porch welcomes you home and the entry hall leads you into the living area. Both living and dining areas are spacious rooms offering beautiful wood floors with inlay details and natural sunlight. The living room is to the front with a ceiling fan and 2 windows facing the street. It opens to the spacious dining room with plenty of room for a large table to entertain. The kitchen is towards the back of the house and boasts slate floors, a lit upper cabinet, and nice counter space with fantastic appliances. Continue back to the laundry room with built in shelves for additional storage and your first full bathroom boasting a gorgeous tiled shower. There is a door to the side entrance here and access to the unfinished basement. Head upstairs to the second floor where you can find 3 bedrooms and another full bathroom offering a clawfoot tub for soaking. The back bedroom has built in shelves and storage on 2 walls along with wood floors. Your nicely sized middle bedroom boasts cork floors and 2 windows for great light. The primary bedroom is to the front of the home featuring a great exposed brick wall, inlay details in the hardwood floors, 2 windows for light, and 2 closets for ample storage space. Continue to the third floor with 2 more bedrooms, one of which would be more suited to be used as a den/office area. The front room is spacious with built in shelves over the exposed brick wall and 2 windows for light. Schedule your showing of this large Fishtown gem today!

title: TOWNHOME - REGENTS PARK
description:

Large 2-bedroom 1.5 bath END UNIT townhome with additional large sunroom in Regents Park in West Norriton Township in a great cul-de-sac location.  This spacious home has 1500 sq. of living space. You’ll enjoy the sun filled open concept living and dining area, that leads into an eat-in kitchen with granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances and recessed lighting. Large unfinished basement with laundry hook up.

The entire interior was renovated in 2021 with fresh Agreeable Grey color paint and newer rugs.  Central Air with gas heating.
Rent includes lawn care and trash.  Tenant is responsible for utilities, including water, sewer, electric/gas and cable.
Easy access to routes 76, 476 and PA turnpike.  Only 5 miles from King of Prussia and minutes away from Einstein Montgomery Hospital.

Description:
4 miles outside the city of Philadelphia, this suburban apartment is conveniently located 1/2 mile from route 476 (blue route) and PA Turnpike entrances in the community of Plymouth Meeting. The third-largest shopping mall in the US, the King of Prussia Mall, is located 11 minutes away by car.  The urban enclave of Manayunk is located 17 minutes by car and another nearby restaurant scene in the borough of Conshohocken is only 10 minutes away.  Also 1 mile away is the convenience of the Plymouth Meeting Mall where you'll find stores and restaurants such as California Pizza Kitchen, PF Changs, Miller’s Ale House, Redstone, Whole Foods, Dick’s Sporting Goods, D&B's, Benihana, Chipolte, Dick's Sporting Goods, Loft, Boscov's, Chick-fil-A, J.Crew, Michael's, Burlington and many others. An AMC multiplex movie theater is also located behind the mall. And just 1-1/2 miles away are retailers such as Lowes, Barnes & Noble, Gap, Old Navy, Target, Bed Bath & Beyond, Best Buy, DSW, Giant Supermarkets, etc. Larger local banks in the area such as Wachovia, PNC, Bank of America, Citizens and PNC, are all within a short drive. Public transportation is also close by. The R6 Regional Train Line can be picked up in Conshohocken 3 miles away. And under 4 miles is the R5 Regional Line in Ambler.
Features and Amenities:
Private entrances
Private parking

title: Modernista On The Main Line
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. title: Chic 3 BR 3.5 Bath Home in Fishtown with 2 Car Parking
description:
Chic 3 BR 3.5 Bath Home in Fishtown with 2 Car Parking! The 1st fl features 10 ft ceilings, a state of the art kitchen with 42" white shaker style cabinets, Quartz counters, GE Profile appliances, glass backsplash and a large center island with waterfall edge, a spacious family room and a separate dining area with beautiful custom antique wine rack. The 2nd floor features 2 large bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms and an ideally situated laundry room with cabinetry. The 3rd floor features a Primary Suite which feels like a private retreat with a Juliet balcony that has motorized shades and drapery, a generous walk-in closet with custom shelving, an extra sitting area and a spa-like master bath with a large, walk-in glass enclosed shower with bench and dual shower heads, a double sink vanity, a spacious linen closet and water closet. The finished lower level with 9'+ ceilings, built-in storage cabinetry and a powder room is the perfect space for a media room, home office, gym; the options are endless. The roof deck offers amazing views of the skyline, bridge and river and features an oversized outdoor sectional and retractable umbrella for lazy weekends and entertaining alike. The house also features custom louvered shades throughout. With 2-CAR PARKING, high ceilings, dual zoned HVAC, tankless hot water heater (new in 2020), lots of sunlight, large windows, 5" oak hardwood floors finished on site, glass railings, this home is not to be missed. A short walk to Johnny Brenda's, La Colombe, Pizzeria Beddia, Wm. Mulherin's Sons, The Fillmore, and all Fishtown has to offer. With easy access to the 95 corridor, the El Stop, and two blocks from Penn Treaty Park and the Delaware waterfront, this is the ideal location to call home.

description:
Chic 3 BR 3.5 Bath Home in Fishtown with 2 Car Parking! The 1st fl features 10 ft ceilings, a state of the art kitchen with 42" white shaker style cabinets, Quartz counters, GE Profile appliances, glass backsplash and a large center island with waterfall edge, a spacious family room and a separate dining area with beautiful custom antique wine rack. title: Beautiful One Bedroom On The Main Line
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. title: Leasing Special: Splendid 2BD/1.5BA with Ample Closet Space
description:
Available NOW | Leasing Special: $1,925/month for a 12 month lease; or $1,895 /month for a 16 month lease
Welcome to 1764 N Hope St #1A! Located on a quiet side street in the popular Olde Kensington area of Philadelphia. This fantastic 2 bedroom / 1.5 bathroom is a bi-level apartment featuring hardwood floors, recessed lighting, a balcony, contemporary design, stainless steel appliances, a spiral staircase, and bright natural light! You enter the unit into the living room with hardwood floors, tons of sunlight, and a lovely half bath for your convenience. Continue back through the open floor plan to the kitchen, which offers bar seating at the counter, cabinets above and below for storage, and stainless steel appliances including a fridge, dishwasher, gas oven/stove range, and built-in overhead microwave. From the kitchen you can access your balcony – perfect for enjoying your morning cup of coffee! The spiral staircase takes you to the lower level where you will find two spacious bedrooms, each with ample closet space and more natural light. The sleek bathroom is accessible from the hall as well as directly from the main bedroom and boasts tile flooring, a shower/tub combo with white subway tile, and a vanity with additional storage space underneath.  The building has a common roof deck where you can enjoy breathtaking views of the Philadelphia skyline and get to know your neighbors! This incredible space won’t last long – schedule a tour today!

title: Unit 219 - Smith School, 1300 S. 19th Street
description: Available as soon as May 2022 - stunning studio, one of the more unique units in the newly renovated Smith School. This studio, 1 bathroom actually features architecture from the original auditorium! As you step inside, you’ll notice the breathtaking arch over the raised platform, the hardwood floors, recessed lighting, and oversized windows that illuminate the entire studio. The kitchen features quartz countertops, white cabinets against textured subway tile backsplash, garbage disposal, and stainless steel appliances. The bathroom has a quartz top vanity and tub/shower with a glass door. The Walter George Smith Public School, listed on the National Register of Historic Places, has undergone an amazing transformation to bring you these apartments! Each unit features high-end finishes while preserving it’s historic character such as the chalkboards, original trim and closets, and overall unique floor plan. All tenants will have access to the three outdoor spaces (over half an acre combined!) on the ground floor and mezzanine patios, and a roof deck with stellar skyline views! This location has a ton to offer now and will only have more soon!
Super modern 3 bed 2 bath bi-level apartment has everything you need and more to be comfortable. The first bedroom is on the left as you enter with plenty of room and a nice double door closet, catching all that morning sunlight! With a massive 1st floor living and dining space, having friends and family over will be easy and fun! Enjoy dining a la carte with your back patio! With a custom bathroom with shower stall and dual vanity on the first floor, you have the modern chic look.
Head downstairs to find two more bedrooms and a full bathroom with similar finishing touches upstairs. The bedrooms downstairs have plenty of room and closet space for all your belongings. With the bedrooms divided by a second large living area, privacy is no issue.
DON’T FORGET YOU HAVE YOUR OWN WASHER AND DRYER!!

title: 1 Bedroom in Northern Liberties
description:
1 bedroom available in a 3-bedroom townhouse in northern liberties looking for one new tenant for May 1st, 2022 -May 1st, 2023, 1 year rental. The townhouse has 4 floors, including own private full bathroom for your bedroom. House includes free garage parking and mini driveway in the back. House includes a patio in the kitchen as well as a rooftop deck overlooking center city as well as the Delaware River and Ben Franklin Bridge, with a full grill and couch with space for television on rooftop as well!
Renters include young professionals who are clean, quiet, and respectful. We are looking to fill the room with a young professional as well. Preferably currently located in the Philadelphia area.
House is fully furnished and includes full modern appliances including laundry room, dishwashers, fridge, and freezer with filtered water system. You will need to furnish your bedroom though!
Your bedroom is located on its own private floor, whereas the other bedrooms are on the same floor, and it has space for bed, desk, and drawers. The view from the bedroom is the front patio, which is decorative with plants and rock walkway.
Walking score is unbelievable as you are close to Penn’s Landing, Northern Liberties town, and all the features of and restaurants in Old City within 5 minutes distance. The Market Frankford line is also 3-minute walk. Additionally, there is loads of free open street parking right by the house. It is a great set up!
If you need to move in earlier than May, please let me know and this can be arranged! Rent will be approximately $900/month.
Please get in touch at your earliest convenience if you would like to secure the space!!

title: Charming One Bedroom
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.
